title: Covid Dashboard
description: The Covid Dashboard project was aiming to provide Covid-19 related statistics, an interactive map, charts and news. It was built using React and Redux for state management. The data is pulled from two public REST API services.

title: Notes App
description: I developed this project after completing my first React online course. The idea behind was to simply practise React core concepts while developing a useful web app with minimalistic UI. Added notes are currently stored in the browser's local storage.

title: Márton Izsáki's Portfolio Website
description: This portfolio website displays the work of the owner in a section that can be filtered by categories. A contact option was built and integrated to the website using Formspree, so it does not require any server side coding or unsafe JS library that would send emails from client-side.

title: DJ Events
description: This project is focusing on server side rendering and Next.JS basics instead of UI. The website has a backend Strapi server running on Heroku, which provides user authentication, and content management.

title: Capture Website
description: This is the second app I developed using React, as part of an online course. The project is focusing on UI & UX, using Framer Motion for animations and page transitions.

title: Ignite Website
description: Ignite was also a project I worked on as part of my React studies, being the first website I developed using Redux.

title: Music Player
description: This music player web app was developed as part of an online course, being the first app I developed in a JavaScript framework: React.

title: Beatmaker App
description: A simple beatmaker web app that was developed in pure HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

title: Days Website Website
description: Simple website focusing on UI and animations.

title: Colors App
description: Generate random color palettes, copy their codes and save your favorites. Developed without a JS framework.

title: Photon Website
description: The Photon website provides images with search function, all pulled from the pexels API

title: To Do List App
description: One of the very first apps I built using JavaScript

title: Adam Kui's Portfolio Website (this website)
description: Interested in how this website was built? Take a look at the source code on GitHub!
